title: K-Lite Mega Codec Pack 12.9.0
text:
Where can I find a list of what's IN it? Is there optional install for different codecs? Can I install the 32-bit AND the 64-bit Packs? Should I? May 16, 2010 - 11:17 AM 
In K-Lite Codec Pack 5.9.7 Mega a problem in SVCPACK installation faced K-Lite Codec Pack\Filter\divX264.ax Unable to register dll/Ocx regiserver32x faild with exit code. Feb 21, 2010 - 12:46 PM 
I'm new to this so sorry if I sound like a complete noob, but does this make m2ts files from an hd pvr work in Windows Movie Maker 2.6? Aug 5, 2009 - 6:37 PM 
It's compatible with Windows 7, 32bit. Flawless! May 19, 2009 - 11:12 PM 
You're joking, right ? Compatibility with Windows 7 ? It's barely even safe to call it a beta product and won't be available for years and you expect compatibility ? Yeah, right. Feb 18, 2009 - 2:22 PM
